Author: AlvinLeito#0720
Content:
Hey @all, I have a general question about the Komodo platform.. If we make an assetchain (what the planning is to go do with the ViisiitCoin), but the SEC sees the essence of the coin as an utility- and security token. So, that in essence we‚Äôll be doing a dSTO in a couple of years after the private sale. 

Is that something that is actually (technically) true? Can we say that we‚Äôre doing a dSTO on the Komodo platform?

Author: AlvinLeito#0720
Content: Also something totally different.. just saw the telegram community in here linked with a bot... how do you connect the bot with the telegram channel/group?

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: STO is just another name for stock offering.   Consult with a securities lawyer on how you should proceed and what is all needed to do such an offering .  The tech can do what you make it do,  but tech is agnostic when it comes to the law it's up to the user / issuer to fulfill whatever compliance they need to

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: It doesn't matter which blockchain platform you use. If you issue a token, offer rewards or benefits to buyers, promise any sort of a return, and allow any US person to participate in the token sale then you must register with the Sec for approval or exemption

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: hey guys, just wondering...if I am running AGAMA lite wallet

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: can I create different receiving addresses?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: one seed = one address

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: New aees

Author: Alright#0419
Content: create a different seed

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: how do i create a new seed?

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: bascially create a new wallet on the lite menu page?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: yes

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: alright, I figured as much...

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: also, how come when I send KMD to a friend, it send out a huge amount from which his small amount gets sent then a another amounts gets returned to me

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: its such a strange way to keep things accounted for

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: is UTXO the reason?

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: I also had a reward of 1.33 listed on my wallet and then when i made a transaction to send to my friend, my reward dropped  to  .5 KMD

Author: Alright#0419
Content: UTXOs is the exact reason

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: You didn't spend the utxo

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: and the reward discrepancy?

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: did I somehow claim it partially?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: if you would have sent the full balance of the wallet in that transaction, you would receive the full amount of rewards

Author: Alright#0419
Content: instead, like poly said, you only spent partial balance of the wallet

Author: Alright#0419
Content: if you want the rest, send the full balance back to yourself

Author: Alright#0419
Content: otherwise, it just keeps accruing. You didn't lose anything

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: yes I spent a small amount, and in a large amount went out, and the balance came back to my wallet...but my rewards accrued showed a it had gone down

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: yeah, I am figuring I didnt lose anything, just wondering why it got auto sent in sense of speaking

Author: Alright#0419
Content: research UTXOs and change addresses

Author: Alright#0419
Content: what you're talking about is a change address

Author: Alright#0419
Content: and is a fundamental principal of bitcoin itself

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: alright I will research it

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: yes, bitcoin seems to be the same

Author: ecbuddy#8524
Content: sorry, I am not as familiar with KMD as I should be...

Content: no worries, if you have any questions, feel free to ping me

Author: Alright#0419
Content: or just ask here, I'm sure there will be someone to answer

Author: Cassius#9158
Content: At the start of 2016 I had some personal stuff to deal with, then Sasha asked me to help with Waves, Incent took off as a company, etc

Author: Audo#5667
Content: what are you up to nowadays?

Author: Cassius#9158
Content: Still working with Waves on content, but because it has coalesced as a Russian initiative my workload is less now and it's less creative. Will be sticking around there indefinitely but I have capacity and interest in more now

Author: Cassius#9158
Content: Similarly Incent is doing well, creating some really cool software, but post-ICO and after the early days, there's less of a role and I'm not cut out for corporate life anyway üòÉ

Author: Cassius#9158
Content: I have various other clients, started my own comms company (www.blockworm.net)

Author: Cassius#9158
Content: But looking for something where I can get my hands properly dirty again and help shape something from the start. I'm involved in one or two grassroots initiatives, which is fun

Author: Cassius#9158
Content: My favourite projects are the ones where I not only get to communicate the ideas, but help shape them from the start

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Ok, cool. Feel free to shoot a message to @Steve Lee incase you are interested of getting involved with Komodo. I'm not sure if there are any positions immediately avialable though.

We have been thinking of ways to build a platform that would better empower the Komodo community. Part of that is to encourgae people to blog / write about Komodo. We will definitely need more ideas and help there.

Author: Audo#5667
Content: I remember talking with one guy in a conference, and he was explaining me how P2P technology requires a P2P community. Otherwise there's just a centralized hub for information (website), and the normal social media channels, and that makes it more like a corporate project versus an open source project largely dirven by its community.
